Storm4 provided pay range
This range is provided by Storm4. Your actual pay will be based on your skills and experience — talk with your recruiter to learn more.
Base pay range
$160,000.00/yr - $210,000.00/yr
⚡ Principal Performance Engineer🏘️ Clean Energy - Solar🌍 Fremont, CA (remote)Join my client to impact the future of solar technology! As a Principal Performance Engineer, you'll analyze data, enhance our product portfolio, and drive customer success. Lead research, algorithm development, and collaborate with a dynamic team to revolutionize solar trackers on a global scale.Responsibilities:Lead research into operational metrics and time series data analysis for solar trackers.Develop algorithms for detecting health issues, predict future problems, and identify root causes.Design experiments, execute cross-functional collaboration, and validate data.Implement algorithms in Python, validate, and integrate with monitoring systems.Create prototype reports, visualizations, and customer-facing features.Mentor junior staff, support global teams, and drive best practices in solar performance and data science.Qualifications (Required):Master's Degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or related field.9+ years in data science, performance engineering, or analytics with large time series datasets.4+ years in solar domain, focusing on utility-scale solar plants.Strong analytical skills, attention to detail, and solar performance understanding.Proficiency in Python, APIs, and ML analysis tools.Experience with statistical analysis and machine learning.Familiarity with solar equipment, health evaluation, and operational aspects.Qualifications (Preferred):Ph.D. is a plus.Knowledge of reporting tools like Power BI.📧 Sounds like you? Please click on the ‘Easy Apply’ button. You can also send your resume directly to emma.stilwell@storm4.com or message me directly!⚡ Storm4 is a specialist GreenTech recruitment firm with clients across Europe, APAC and North America. To discuss open opportunities or career options, please visit our website at www.storm4.com and follow the Storm4 LinkedIn page for the latest jobs and intel.
